secondaryTranslation: Thank you!
It’s good like this.
I support you.
What did you say?
Coming!
He’s good person.
Tell him so he understands.
Are things urgent/bad?
Don’t walk away, scaredy cat!
Don’t blame me.
Do you know him?
There’s this possibility.
You better remember!
It’s my turn.
He’s one generation older than me.
I’m not close with him.
Why didn’t you come?
I lent my book to someone already.
You think you’re so smart! (You’re not that smart.)
Ok! Stop arguing.
You often offend others.

audioText: Guá pí lí khah tsē huè.
secondaryTranslation: I'm older than you.
It’s ok either way.
Those two’s personalities are compatible.
I agree with your opinion
A-ing often is smiling.
We currently aren’t able to meet.
It’s important as people to understand logic.

audioText: I sī tsi̍t ê phóo-thong lâng.
secondaryTranslation: He’s a normal person.
What you’re saying isn’t wrong.
What other matters do you have?

primaryTranslation: 再說什麼都是白費工夫。
secondaryTranslation: Saying anything else is just a waste of time.
This morning, she came to look for you.

audioText: Lí kóng-uē m̄ hó hiah tuā-siann.
secondaryTranslation: You shouldn’t be so loud when you talk.
Siblings definitely should be of one mind.
What’s your objective for coming here?

audioText: Guá siong-sìn lí mā ū tông-kám.
secondaryTranslation: I believe you have the same feelings.
I hope you can complete me.

audioText: Tshiánn ta̍k-ke tiām-tiām thiann guá kóng.
secondaryTranslation: Please, everyone listen to me.

audioText: Lí kín lâi kā guá tàu-kha-tshiú.
secondaryTranslation: Hurry up and come help me.
Why taught you to do it like this?

audioText: Lí puê guá khì hit-pîng hó--bô?
secondaryTranslation: Can you go over there with me?

audioText: Tsit ê siau-sit kám ū khak-si̍t?
secondaryTranslation: Is this news accurate?

audioText: Lí mài koh oh i kóng-uē—ah.
secondaryTranslation: Stop trying to speak like him.
Oh! So it’s like this.
Invite her to attend the activity.

audioText: Lí tsit ê ì-kiàn tsin pó-kuì.
secondaryTranslation: Your opinion is highly valued.
I don’t know what happened.

audioText: Guá tsá tō tsai-iánn i ū būn-tê.
secondaryTranslation: I already knew way back that he has problems.

primaryTranslation: 我們干萬不可以破壞彼此的威情。
secondaryTranslation: We absolutely cannot damage our relationship with each other.

audioText: Lín nñg ê mài koh uan-ke—ah--lah!
primaryTranslation: 你們兩個人不要再吵了啦！
secondaryTranslation: You two need to stop arguing!

audioText: Guá ū tsiap-tioh lí kià--lâi ê phue.
secondaryTranslation: I receiver the letter you sent.

audioText: In nñg ê lâng ê kám-tsîng tsin hó.
primaryTranslation: 他們兩個人的感情很好。
secondaryTranslation: Those two people have a great relationship.

台語漢字: 這件代誌毋著的人是你。
audioText: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì m̄-tiöh ê lâng sī lí.
secondaryTranslation: The person at fault on this matter is you.

台語漢字: 這件代誌我共伊回掉矣。
audioText: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì guá kā i huê-tiāu--ah.
primaryTranslation: 這件事我已經謝絕他了。
secondaryTranslation: That matter is already taken care of

台語漢字: 你真正是娶著一个好某。
audioText: Lí tsin-tsiànn sī tshuā-tio̍h tsi̍t ê hó bóo.
primaryTranslation: 你真的是娶到一個好老婆。
secondaryTranslation: You truly married a great wife.

台語漢字: 伊苫勸逐家愛關心社會。
audioText: I khóo-khǹg ta̍k-ke ài kuan-sim siā-huē.
primaryTranslation: 他勸告大家要關心社會。
secondaryTranslation: He urged everyone to care about society.

audioText: Ban-tshiánn-sī, tán i lâi tsiah-koh kóng.
secondaryTranslation: Wait a bit, wait for him to come to discuss.

台語漢字: 我無佮意伊做代誌的方式。
audioText: Guá bô kah-ì i tsò tāi-tsì ê hong-sik.
primaryTranslation: 我不喜歡他做事情的方法。
secondaryTranslation: I don't like the way he does things.

台語漢字: 我承認這項代誌是我毋著。
audioText: Guá sîng-jīn tsit hāng tāi-tsì sī guá m̄-tio̍h.
primaryTranslation: 我承認這件事是我不對。
secondaryTranslation: I admit that this is my fault.

台語漢字: 逐家咧開講，講甲笑咍哈。
audioText: Ta̍k-ke teh khai-káng, kóng kah tshiò-hai-hai.
primaryTranslation: 華大家在聊天，說得哈哈笑。
secondaryTranslation: Everyone is chatting and laughing.

台語漢字: 聽你的腔口敢若是臺南人。
audioText: Thiann lí ê khiunn-kháu kánn-ná sī Tâi-lâm-lâng.
primaryTranslation: 聽你的腔調好像是臺南人。
secondaryTranslation: Your accent seems like it’s from Tainan.

台語漢字: 我共你當做是上好的朋友。
audioText: Guá ka lí tòng-tsò sī siōng hó ê pîng-iú.
primaryTranslation: 我把你當做是最好的朋友。
secondaryTranslation: I consider you my best friend.

台語漢字: 伊萬頊代誌攏愛人鬥相共。
audioText: I bān-hāng tāi-tsì lóng ài lâng tàu-sann-kāng.
primaryTranslation: 他每件事都要別人幫忙。
secondaryTranslation: He needs help with everything.

台語漢字: 你敢有聽著彼件代誌的風聲？
audioText: Lí kám ū thiann-tio̍h hit kiānn tāi-tsì ê hong-siann?
primaryTranslation: 你有沒有聽到那件事情的消息？
secondaryTranslation: Have you heard any news about this issue?

台語漢字: 這件代誌咱有需要参詳一下！
audioText: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì lán ū su-iàu tsham-siông—tsi̍t-ê!
primaryTranslation: 這件事情我們需要商量一下！
secondaryTranslation: We need to discuss this issue.

台語漢字: 無代無誌你是按怎會去惹伊？
audioText: Bô-tāi-bô-tsì lí sī-án-tsuánn ē khì jiá--i?
secondaryTranslation: Why bother him when there’s no problem?

台語漢字: 人咧叫你，你嘛共人應一下。
audioText: Lâng teh kiò--lí, lí mā kā lâng ìn—tsi̍t-ē.
primaryTranslation: 人家在叫你，你好万也回答一下。
secondaryTranslation: Someone’s calling you, you need to respond.

台語漢字: 你出門在外，家己千萬愛細膩。
audioText: Lí tshut-mn̂g tsāi guā, ka-kī tshian-bān ài sè-jī.
primaryTranslation: 你出門在外，自己千萬要小心。
secondaryTranslation: You’re heading outside, you need to take care of yourself.

台語漢字: 兩个囡仔為著𨑨週物仔咧冤
audioText: Nn̄g ê gín-á uī-tio̍h tshit-thô-mih-á teh uan.
primaryTranslation: 兩個孩子為了玩具而吵架。
secondaryTranslation: Two kids are arguing over a toy.
Good morning, dad!
What’s your name?
She’s my wife.
He’s my neighbor.
Has this child been named?

primaryTranslation: 我兒子今年二十多歲了。
secondaryTranslation: My son is over 20 years old now.

台語漢字: 個兩个自小學就是同窗。
audioText: In nñg ê tsū sió-ha̍k tō-sī tông-tshong.
primaryTranslation: 他們兩個人從小學就是同學。
secondaryTranslation: Those two have been classmates since elementary school.
Ahead is a dead end.
The boat’s parked under the bridge.

audioText: Tsit tiâu sió-lōo tsin pháinn kiânn.
secondaryTranslation: This road is hard to move through.
Where are you headed?

audioText: Tsit tâi tshia iáu ē-sái khiâ.
secondaryTranslation: This car can still be driven.

audioText: Guá ê tshia-phiò sī phah óng-huê--ê.
primaryTranslation: 我的車票買的是來回票。
secondaryTranslation: My ticket is round-trip.
Please make a left turn.
She already returned to the south.

台語漢字: 這條路傷狹，袂當相閃車。
audioText: Tsit tiâu lōo siunn e̍h, bē-tàng sio-siám-tshia.
secondaryTranslation: This road is too narrow, there’s no way to pass.

台語漢字: 市場離遮真遠，愛行真久。
audioText: Tshī-tiûnn lī tsia tsin hn̄g, ài kiânn tsin kú.
primaryTranslation: 市場距離這裡很遠，要走很久。
secondaryTranslation: The market is very far from here. It’s a long walk.

台語漢字: 阮這个庄頭的交通真無方便。
audioText: Guán tsit ê tsng-thâu ê kau-thong tsin bô hong-piān.
primaryTranslation: 我們這個村莊的交通很不便利。
secondaryTranslation: Our village’s traffic is inconvenient.

台語漢字: 落雨天的時陣，這條路就變甲真歹行。
audioText: Lo̍h-hoo-thinn ê sî-tsūn, tsit tiâu lōo tō piàn kah tsin pháinn kiânn.
primaryTranslation: 下雨天的時候，這條路就變得很難走。
secondaryTranslation: When it’s rainy, this road becomes very difficult to go through.
Is this edible?
I'm too full.
How many dishes are there?
I’m not full yet.
Freeze the meat.
He loves eating braised pork.
I'm going to buy eggs.
He is vegetarian, not a carnivore.
The food got burnt.
Those fruits are for you to eat.

audioText: Tsit siunn kam-á hōo lín khì pun.
primaryTranslation: 這箱橘子給你們分了吃。
secondaryTranslation: This crate of oranges is for you all to share.

audioText: Tsit bué hî-á tsian liáu ū tshiah.
secondaryTranslation: This fish is slightly seared.
Kids shouldn’t be too picky.
Don’t let the soy sauce drip.

audioText: Lí kám ū phīnn-tio̍h tshàu-hué-ta bī?
secondaryTranslation: Did you smell the burnt flavor?

audioText: Tsit ê thng-thâu ê tsu-bī bē-bái.
secondaryTranslation: This soup’s flavor is not bad.

audioText: I kā piánn té ji̍p-khì a̍p-á-té.
primaryTranslation: 他把餅乾裝進去盒子裡頭。
secondaryTranslation: He put the cookies into the box.

台語漢字: 新竹出產的貢丸真有名。
audioText: Sin-tik tshut-sán ê kòng-uân tsin ū-miâ.
primaryTranslation: 新竹生產的貢丸很有名。
secondaryTranslation: Hsinchu’s meatballs are famous.

台語漢字: 你欲啉咖啡抑是欲啉茶？
audioText: Lí beh lim ka-pi ia̍h-sī beh lim-tê?
primaryTranslation: 你要喝咖啡還是要喝茶？
secondaryTranslation: Do you want to drink coffee or tea?

台語漢字: 西瓜著愛著時才會好食。
audioText: Si-kue tio̍h-ài tio̍h-sì tsiah ē hó-tsia̍h.
primaryTranslation: 西瓜要當季出產的才好吃。
secondaryTranslation: Watermelon needs to be in season for it to taste good.

台語漢字: 我的嚨喉拼著一枝魚刺。
audioText: Guá ê nâ-âu khê-tio̍h tsit ki hî-tshì.
primaryTranslation: 我的喉嚨卡著一根魚刺。
secondaryTranslation: My throat has a fish bone stuck in it.

台語漢字: 糖仔一人一粒，毋通相爭。
audioText: Thn̂g-á tsi̍t lâng tsi̍t lia̍p, m̄-thang sio-tsenn.
secondaryTranslation: Don’t fight, there’s a piece of candy for everyone.

台語漢字: 叫恁老爸趕緊轉來食暗啦。
audioText: Kiò lín lāu-pē kuánn-kīn tńg-lâi tsia̍h-àm--lah.
primaryTranslation: 叫你爸爸趕快回來吃晚飯啦。
secondaryTranslation: Tell your dad to hurry up and come eat dinner.

台語漢字: 我來揀菜，揀好才予你洗。
audioText: Guá lâi kíng-tshài, kíng-hó tsiah hõo lí sé.
primaryTranslation: 我來挑菜，挑好再給你洗。
secondaryTranslation: I’ll pick the vegetables, and then you wash them.

台語漢字: 伊第一擺煮的菜閣袂歹食。
audioText: I tē-it pái tsú ê tshài koh bē pháinn-tsia̍h.
primaryTranslation: 他第一次煮的菜還不難吃。
secondaryTranslation: For her first time cooking, the dishes are not bad.

台語漢字: 食物一定愛清氣，才有衛生。
audioText: Si̍t-bu̍t it-tīng ài tshing-khi, tsiah ū uē-sing.
primaryTranslation: 食物一定要乾淨，才衛生。
secondaryTranslation: Food needs to be clean to be sanitary.

台語漢字: 這塊碗較深，會使貯較濟湯。
audioText: Tsit tè uánn khah tshim, ē-sái té khah tsē thng.
primaryTranslation: 這個碗比較深，能盛比較多的湯。
secondaryTranslation: This bowl is deeper, so it can hold more soup.

audioText: Tsit tiánn bah guá lóo kui ē-poo.
primaryTranslation: 這鍋肉我滷了整個下午。
secondaryTranslation: This pot of meat has been braising all afternoon.

台語漢字: 伊逐工透早攏愛啉豆奶、食包仔。
audioText: I ta̍k kang thàu-tsá lóng ài lim tāu-ling, tsia̍h pau-á.
primaryTranslation: 他每天一大早都要喝豆漿、吃包子。
secondaryTranslation: This pot of meat has been braising all afternoon.
Split it into two.
Stop crying!
Stop moving!
If you’re sleepy, just go to sleep.
You’re choosing which one?
Flip this side over first.
He just left not long ago.
You all need to be silent!
Go open the door.

audioText: I mã beh tuè lí khì.
secondaryTranslation: He wants to go with you.
Can you go fold the clothes?
Heat the water to shower.
I need to prepare to hike down the mountain.
Don’t come ack too late.
Yesterday, he didn’t return to sleep.

audioText: Lí mài khiā tī tsia tìn tè.
secondaryTranslation: Don’t stand here and get in the way.
Pinch down on it.

audioText: Toh-á hōo thâng tsiù tsi̍t khang.
primaryTranslation: 桌子被蟲咬触了一個洞。
secondaryTranslation: The desk had a hole from a bug biting it.
Come! Hurry come and see!
Get the stuff down here.

audioText: I ê thâu khì lòng-tio̍h toh-kak.
secondaryTranslation: Her head hit the table corner.
Nice effort! Rest for a bit.

audioText: Li khì phâng-tê lâi hōo lâng-kheh lim.
secondaryTranslation: Go bring the tea for our guests to drink.

audioText: Kā tsit pak tôo tìng tī tsit bīn piah.
primaryTranslation: 把這幅圖釘在這面牆上。
secondaryTranslation: Nail this picture to the wall.

primaryTranslation: 我試試看能不能找到他。
secondaryTranslation: I'll try to find him.

台語漢字: 我行到半路就拄著伊矣。
audioText: Guá kiânn kàu puànn-lōo tō tú-tio̍h i--ah.
primaryTranslation: 我走到半路就遇見他了。
secondaryTranslation: I was halfway there when I met him.

audioText: Kok-lâng ê mi̍h-kiānn ài kòo hōo hó.
secondaryTranslation: Keep an eye on your own belongings.
If you turn it over, you can write on the back too.

audioText: Mi̍h-kiānn īng liáu, ài khǹg tuà guân-uī.
secondaryTranslation: When you finish using something, return it to its original position.

台語漢字: 逐擺看著伊攏微微仔笑。
audioText: Ta̍k-pái khuànn-tio̍h i lóng bî-bî-á tshiò.
secondaryTranslation: Whenever I see him, he’s smiling.

台語漢字: 欲上崎矣，你著愛出力行。
audioText: Beh tsiūnn-kiā—ah, lí tio̍h-ài tshut-la̍t kiânn.
secondaryTranslation: Going uphill, you’ll need to use effort.

台語漢字: 伊共我拍，我用手共伊掰開。
audioText: I kā guá phah, guá iōng tshiú kā i pué--khui.
primaryTranslation: 他打我，我用手把他擋開。
secondaryTranslation: He hit me, and I used my hand to block.

台語漢字: 禮拜欲大摒掃，毋通走出去耍。
audioText: Lé-pài beh tuā-piànn-sàu, m̄-thang tsáu tshut-khì sńg.
primaryTranslation: 星期日要大掃除，不要跑出去玩。
secondaryTranslation: On Sunday, wen led to clean, so don’t run out to play.

台語漢字: 這件代誌啥物時陣欲開始動手？
audioText: Tsit kiānn tāi-tsì siánn-mih sî-tsūn beh khai-sí tāng-tshiú?
primaryTranslation: 這件事情什麼時候開始著手進行？
secondaryTranslation: When are we getting started on this task?

台語漢字: 你欲出門進前，愛會記得紮錢
audioText: Lí beh tshut-mn̂g tsin-tsîng, ài ē-kì-tit tsah tsînn.
primaryTranslation: 你要出門之前，要記得帶錢。
secondaryTranslation: Before going out, remember to bring money.
